3. City Council

City Council
============

Council Meetings
----------------

* 5:00 p.m.
* 2nd Tuesday of every month in Council Chambers at City Hall

Special Meetings are called by the Mayor.

Council Meeting Agendas and Minutes
-----------------------------------

[Visit the Agenda Center for Agendas and Minutes](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/AgendaCenter/City-Council-2)

Members
-------

* Judy B. Cochran, Mayor
* Alan Cook, Mayor Pro-tem
* Dr. Ray Luna, Alderman
* Bobby Jackson Sr., Alderman
* Andy Evans, Alderman
* Marty Drake, Alderman

The term of office is two years.

Facts About Your Municipal Government
-------------------------------------

### Date of Incorporation - October 3, 1902

### City Charter - General Law City - Type A

### Form of Government - Council / Manager

### Elected Officials - Mayor and Five Council Members

### Mayor Judy Cochran

![Mayor Judy Cochran](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1226 "Mayor Judy Cochran")

### Mayor Pro-tem Alan Cook

![Mayor Pro-tem Alan Cook](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1227 "Mayor Pro-tem Alan Cook")

### Alderman Ray Luna

![Alderman Raymond Luna](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1228 "Alderman Raymond Luna")

### Alderman Bobby Jackson Sr.

![Alderman Bobby Jackson Sr.](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1231 "Alderman Bobby Jackson Sr.")

### Alderman Andy Evans

![Alderman Andy Evans 2025](https://www.cityoflivingston-tx.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1441 "Alderman Andy Evans 2025")
